ing: 2 slices honey whole wheat bread, toasted
des: "An easy sandwich for those days when you are looking for quick lunch or to serve with soup and salad for dinner."
ins: Spread one side of each toast piece with mayonnaise. Place smoked turkey breast slices onto one piece of toast and spread turkey with cranberry sauce; sprinkle with walnuts. Top with lettuce leaf and the remaining toast to make a sandwich.
